member.name: T:PInvoke.Fusion
member.summary: Exported functions from the Fusion.dll Windows library that are available to Desktop apps only.
member.content: Methods and nested types that are not strictly P/Invokes but provide a slightly higher level of functionality to ease calling into native code.
member.summary: Exported functions from the Fusion.dll Windows library that are available to Desktop apps only.
member.content: Methods and nested types that are not strictly P/Invokes but provide a slightly higher level of functionality to ease calling into native code.

member.name: M:PInvoke.Fusion.CreateAssemblyCache(PInvoke.Fusion.IAssemblyCache@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a pointer to a new instance that represents the global assembly cache.
member.param: The returned pointer.
Reserved for future extensibility. dwReserved must be 0 (zero).

member.name: T:PInvoke.Fusion.AssemblyInfoFlags
member.summary: Flags that can be specified in .

member.name: F:PInvoke.Fusion.AssemblyInfoFlags.None
member.summary: No flags.

member.name: F:PInvoke.Fusion.AssemblyInfoFlags.ASSEMBLYINFO_FLAG_INSTALLED
member.summary: Indicates that the assembly is installed. The current version of the .NET Framework always sets dwAssemblyFlags to this value.

member.name: F:PInvoke.Fusion.AssemblyInfoFlags.ASSEMBLYINFO_FLAG_PAYLOADRESIDENT
member.summary: Indicates that the assembly is a payload resident. The current version of the .NET Framework never sets dwAssemblyFlags to this value.

member.name: T:PInvoke.Fusion.FusionInstallReferenceFlags
member.summary: Flags that may be specified by .

member.name: F:PInvoke.Fusion.FusionInstallReferenceFlags.None
member.summary: No flags.

member.name: T:PInvoke.Fusion.FUSION_INSTALL_REFERENCE
member.summary: Represents a reference that an application makes to an assembly that the application has installed in the global assembly cache.

member.name: F:PInvoke.Fusion.FUSION_INSTALL_REFERENCE.FUSION_REFCOUNT_MSI_GUID
member.summary: The assembly is referenced by an application that was installed using the Microsoft Windows Installer. The szIdentifier field is set to MSI, and the szNonCanonicalData field is set to Windows Installer. This scheme is used for Windows side-by-side assemblies.

member.name: F:PInvoke.Fusion.FUSION_INSTALL_REFERENCE.FUSION_REFCOUNT_UNINSTALL_SUBKEY_GUID
member.summary: The assembly is referenced by an application that appears in the Add/Remove Programs interface. The szIdentifier field provides the token that registers the application with the Add/Remove Programs interface.

member.name: F:PInvoke.Fusion.FUSION_INSTALL_REFERENCE.FUSION_REFCOUNT_FILEPATH_GUID
member.summary: The assembly is referenced by an application that is represented by a file in the file system. The szIdentifier field provides the path to this file.

member.name: F:PInvoke.Fusion.FUSION_INSTALL_REFERENCE.FUSION_REFCOUNT_OPAQUE_STRING_GUID
member.summary: The assembly is referenced by an application that is represented only by an opaque string. The szIdentifier field provides this opaque string. The global assembly cache does not check for the existence of opaque references when you remove this value.

member.name: F:PInvoke.Fusion.FUSION_INSTALL_REFERENCE.FUSION_REFCOUNT_OSINSTALL_GUID
member.summary: This value is reserved.

member.name: F:PInvoke.Fusion.FUSION_INSTALL_REFERENCE.cbSize
member.summary: The size of the structure in bytes.

member.name: F:PInvoke.Fusion.FUSION_INSTALL_REFERENCE.dwFlags
member.summary: Reserved for future extensibility. This value must be 0 (zero).

member.name: F:PInvoke.Fusion.FUSION_INSTALL_REFERENCE.guidScheme
member.summary: The entity that adds the reference. This field can have one of the following values: , , , ,

member.name: F:PInvoke.Fusion.FUSION_INSTALL_REFERENCE.szIdentifier
member.summary: A unique string that identifies the application that installed the assembly in the global assembly cache. Its value depends upon the value of the field.

member.name: F:PInvoke.Fusion.FUSION_INSTALL_REFERENCE.szNonCannonicalData
member.summary: A string that is understood only by the entity that adds the reference. The global assembly cache stores this string, but does not use it.

member.name: P:PInvoke.Fusion.FUSION_INSTALL_REFERENCE.szIdentifier_IntPtr
member.summary: A unique string that identifies the application that installed the assembly in the global assembly cache. Its value depends upon the value of the field.

member.name: P:PInvoke.Fusion.FUSION_INSTALL_REFERENCE.szNonCannonicalData_IntPtr
member.summary: A string that is understood only by the entity that adds the reference. The global assembly cache stores this string, but does not use it.

member.name: T:PInvoke.Fusion.IAssemblyCache
member.summary: Represents the global assembly cache for use by the fusion technology.

member.name: M:PInvoke.Fusion.IAssemblyCache.UninstallAssembly(PInvoke.Fusion.UninstallAssemblyFlags,System.String,PInvoke.Fusion.FUSION_INSTALL_REFERENCE*,PInvoke.Fusion.UninstallDisposition*)
member.summary: Uninstalls the specified assembly from the global assembly cache.
member.param: Flags defined in Fusion.idl.
The name of the assembly to uninstall.
A structure that contains the installation data for the assembly.
One of the disposition values defined in Fusion.idl.

member.name: M:PInvoke.Fusion.IAssemblyCache.QueryAssemblyInfo(PInvoke.Fusion.QueryAssemblyInfoFlags,System.String,PInvoke.Fusion.ASSEMBLY_INFO*)
member.summary: Gets the requested data about the specified assembly.
member.param: Flags defined in Fusion.idl.
The name of the assembly for which data will be retrieved.
An structure that contains data about the assembly.

member.name: M:PInvoke.Fusion.IAssemblyCache.CreateAssemblyCacheItem(PInvoke.Fusion.AssemblyCacheInstallFlags,System.Object,PInvoke.Fusion.IAssemblyCacheItem@,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a reference to a new object.
member.param: Flags defined in Fusion.idl.
Reserved for future extensibility. must be a null reference.
The returned pointer
Uncanonicalized, comma-separated name=value pairs. Optional.

member.name: M:PInvoke.Fusion.IAssemblyCache.CreateAssemblyScavenger(System.Object@)
member.summary: Reserved for internal use by the fusion technology.
member.param: The returned IUnknown pointer

member.name: M:PInvoke.Fusion.IAssemblyCache.InstallAssembly(PInvoke.Fusion.AssemblyCacheInstallFlags,System.String,PInvoke.Fusion.FUSION_INSTALL_REFERENCE*)
member.summary: Installs the specified assembly in the global assembly cache.
member.param: Flags defined in Fusion.idl.
The path to the manifest for the assembly to install.
A structure that contains data for the installation.

member.name: T:PInvoke.Fusion.IAssemblyCacheItem
member.summary: Represents a single assembly in the global assembly cache.

member.name: M:PInvoke.Fusion.IAssemblyCacheItem.CreateStream(System.UInt32,System.String,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,mscoree.IStream@,System.UInt64*)
member.summary: Creates a stream with the specified name and format.
member.param: Flags defined in Fusion.idl.
The name of the stream to be created.
The format of the file to be streamed.
Format-specific flags defined in Fusion.idl.
A pointer to the address of the returned instance.
The maximum size of the stream referenced by .

member.name: M:PInvoke.Fusion.IAssemblyCacheItem.Commit(System.UInt32,System.UInt32*)
member.summary: Commits the cached assembly reference to memory.
member.param: Flags defined in Fusion.idl.
A value that indicates the result of the operation.

member.name: M:PInvoke.Fusion.IAssemblyCacheItem.AbortItem
member.summary: Allows the assembly in the global assembly cache to perform cleanup operations before it is released.

member.name: T:PInvoke.Fusion.QueryAssemblyInfoFlags
member.summary: The flags that may be passed to the method.

member.name: F:PInvoke.Fusion.QueryAssemblyInfoFlags.None
member.summary: No flags.

member.name: F:PInvoke.Fusion.QueryAssemblyInfoFlags.QUERYASMINFO_FLAG_VALIDATE
member.summary: Validates the assembly files in the side-by-side assembly store against the assembly manifest. This includes the verification of the assembly's hash and strong name signature.

member.name: F:PInvoke.Fusion.QueryAssemblyInfoFlags.QUERYASMINFO_FLAG_GETSIZE
member.summary: Returns the size of all files in the assembly.

member.name: T:PInvoke.Fusion.ASSEMBLY_INFO
member.summary: Contains information about an assembly that is registered in the global assembly cache.

member.name: F:PInvoke.Fusion.ASSEMBLY_INFO.cbAssemblyInfo
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the structure. This field is reserved for future extensibility.

member.name: F:PInvoke.Fusion.ASSEMBLY_INFO.dwAssemblyFlags
member.summary: Flags that indicate installation details about the assembly.

member.name: F:PInvoke.Fusion.ASSEMBLY_INFO.uliAssemblySizeInKB
member.summary: The total size, in kilobytes, of the files that the assembly contains.

member.name: F:PInvoke.Fusion.ASSEMBLY_INFO.pszCurrentAssemblyPathBuf
member.summary: A pointer to a string buffer that holds the current path to the manifest file. The path must end with a null character.

member.name: F:PInvoke.Fusion.ASSEMBLY_INFO.cchBuf
member.summary: The number of wide characters, including the null terminator, that contains.

member.name: M:PInvoke.Fusion.ASSEMBLY_INFO.Create
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct with the field initialized.

member.name: P:PInvoke.Fusion.ASSEMBLY_INFO.pszCurrentAssemblyPathBuf_IntPtr
member.summary: A pointer to a string buffer that holds the current path to the manifest file. The path must end with a null character.

member.name: T:PInvoke.Fusion.UninstallDisposition
member.summary: Enumerates values that may be returned by the function.
